model

Class ProgramOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ProgramOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ProgramOptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    This class is used to store the state of the GUI options. It's used to initilise various objects in the back end with the settings it has.
    Author:
    Craig
